description:
The Kurosaki family drops everything to visit the grave of Ichigo`s mother.  Ichigo intended to take a day off from Soul Reaper duties, but finds Rukia waiting for him at the cemetery.  When she learns how Ichigo`s mother died, Rukia suggests that perhaps the Hollow who came after him was the one who killed his mother.  Ichigo refuses to listen and runs off. Then a Soul Reaper named Saidoh appears to take Rukia away from the temporal world in which she has overstayed.
Source: crunchyroll
